p: Protease inhibitors target viral nsps needed for its replication, such as the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp) inhibited by ribavirin (which also inhibits viral mRNA capping); the 3C-like protease (3CLpro) is inhibited by the lopinavir-ritonavir combination ( 48), which seems to have better results compared to ribavirin, which was associated with anemia, hypoxia and increased risk of death in SARS patients ( 61).
